encyclopedia.content: 英文原意：焰火。 在软件界，Fireworks指网页三剑客之一的软件。原为Macromedia公司所有。在Macromedia被Adobe兼并之后，Adobe又进一步发展了此软件，但是与Macromedia的风格差别较大。将来有可能被Photoshop等取代。现最新版本Adobe Fireworks CS5.1。 fireworks是一个强大的网页图形设计工具，你可以使用它创建和编辑位图、矢量图形，还可以非常轻松的做出各种网页设计中常见的效果，比如翻转图象，下拉菜单等，设计完成以后，

entry.def: Fireworks are small objects that are lit to entertain people on special occasions. They contain chemicals and burn brightly or attractively, often with a loud noise, when you light them.

example.ex: Berlin people drank champagne, set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
example.tran: 柏林市民喝香槟、放焰火、鸣车笛。

entry.def: You use fireworks to refer to an occasion on which fireworks are lit to entertain people.

example.ex: On the night of the fireworks we had a really good spot.
example.tran: 观看焰火表演的那天晚上，我们找了一个非常好的位置。

entry.tran: 精彩难忘的演出(或作品)
entry.def: An exciting and impressive performance or piece of writing can be referred to as fireworks .

example.ex: It is given a typically thoughtful production with just enough theatrical fireworks.
example.tran: 该剧在制作上一如既往地花费了心思，舞台演出效果也相当精彩。

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) a device with an explosive that burns at a low rate and with colored flames; can be used to illuminate areas or send signals etc.

sentences.en: Be careful that you don’t set the fireworks off by mistake.
sentences.cn: 当心点,别弄错了引起那些爆竹爆炸。

sentences.en: Fireworks added to the attraction of the festival night.
sentences.cn: 烟火使节日之夜更加生辉。
